title: Lmao at that  Graves's new passive name
body:
In Boards, I have read tons of threads about not wanting Graves's passive to be named "Destiny" since another champion already has that exact same name.

So Riot heard their prayers, and have answered with...

http://i.imgur.com/M5ayJAc.jpg

Very well done Rito. Gotta love that thinking power!

https://media.giphy.com/media/gsYKROakiJQPu/giphy.gif

replies.body:
{{champion:104}} :*"Hey there T.F, I finally fixed myself a new gun, look at this here beaut"*
{{champion:4}} :*"Well, that is a pretty good replica of your old gun, minus the blood splatters, of course."*
{{champion:104}} :*"Ah, but it has some new kinks as well, woe be the fool who tries to go up against me this time"*
{{champion:4}} :*"Heh, and what are you calling your new girlfriend then?"*
{{champion:104}} :*"Well... she looks like my old gun... but she's new... how 'bout New Destiny?"*
{{champion:4}} :*"...Really Malcolm? I mean, you were never good at naming things, but... really?"*
{{champion:104}} :*"Oh piss off, I'm not taking guff from somebody who calls themselves 'Twisted Fate'"*

> {{champion:4}} :*"...Really Malcolm? I mean, you were never good at naming things, but... really?"*
> {{champion:104}} :*"Oh piss off, I'm not taking guff from somebody who calls themselves 'Twisted Fate'"*

https://localtvwnep.files.wordpress.com/2012/12/shots_fired.jpg?w=770
that totally sounds like them
I also read it in their voices too lmao. This is too perf.

Destiny ---> New Destiny

Next Update on PBE:

"Definitely Not Destiny"
http://i2.kym-cdn.com/entries/icons/facebook/000/004/128/BRILLIANT_.jpg -by Rito
[insert cigar joke here]
you mean how they want it to be graves but its gragas esq
*when Graves is fed*
That can't be graves... He doesn't have a cigar.

Passive Names:
Buckie
Buckshot
Boom b***h!
Boom stick.
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=pFriRcIwqNU
up voted for Bruce Campbell.

Considering that his new passive is basically an adapted Buckshot (his current Q); I don't know why they didn't just maintain the name "Buckshot". Also "Buckshot" represents buckshots more than "New destiny" will ever do. I mean, a guy shooting you with a shotgun is not a new destiny. It's a crime.
New Destiny sounds like a Chinese Restaurant
roflmao
Graves doesn't have time to think up new names for his shotgun, so he's taking the simple approach

Ain't got time to bleed, so why would he have time to name his shotgun? 

Graves logic. Ain't got time for a cigar, ain't got time for anything other than exploding some one's face.
Destiny's Child
I vote for "Manifest Destiny" as his passive name.
This, omg so much this.
I find New Destiny sounds worst then Destiny. it IS the name of his shotgun after all.
He lost his old gun in the burning tides so this seems more fitting

> [{quoted}](name=PhantasmalKing,realm=NA,application-id=cIfEodbz,discussion-id=0GpR5di6,comment-id=000d0000,timestamp=2015-11-03T16:33:59.084+0000)
>
> He lost his old gun in the burning tides so this seems more fitting

ah. I missed the burning tides event so i have no clue what happened

Destiny II
Destiny - The graves one
Destiny the other one
Destiny Second
Edited: Destino Dos
Destiny 2: the Electric Bugaloo
2destined5u

I was a fan of
"Big Ass Gun"
Being his passive

His weapon beeing named Destiny while Twisted Fate ultimate also beeing named Destiny is intentional (because of the relacion between Graves and Twisted Fate)... Meanwhile, Destiny broke in Bilgewater event, so Graves got a new one, and the name can me _New_ Destiny, cause isn't as much different from the older model, just more actualized.

That was my thought about the name-change. Sure, it sounds completely uncreative and a little weird, but I think it thematically fits Graves since he literally has a new Destiny now. If you want to get into metaphors, New Destiny makes sense since Graves's destiny has changed after he buried the hatchet with TF, but even disregarding that point it's a good name for his passive.

Since we're already knee-deep in memes though, I'm assuming no one's going to see this post.

New Destiny: The Taken Queen 

.

.

.

Kappa
I Can't Believe It's Not Destiny
eh close but no cigar
If they're gonna go with a generic passive name, why not just call it "Graves passive 2.0"?

Destiny is the name of his shotgun.

He lost his shotgun after the events of Burning Tides, albeith he said that a gunsmith in Piltover could make him a new one. One could assume that he just named his shotgun "New Destiny" because he didn't want to bother thinking about a new name.
Destiny is the name of his gun though...

I almost fell out of my chair when I saw the name for his new passive was "New Destiny"

It's like they did the bare minimum to fix the problem.
His gun is named Destiny, clearly they wanted to reflect that.
Who says graves and twisted fate aren't getting back together?
I guess the people who complain don't get that it's called that because he used to be partners with Twisted Fate.
God, you people will complain about anything. Miserable.
Consumerism, definitely not healthy, but get over it.
You know that that was the name given in the Bildgewater event months ago? I mean, yes the naming isn't particularly inspired, but it's not something they pulled out of their ass yesterday.
why dont we name is e new vault? {{champion:133}} _screeching intensifies_{{champion:133}}

I'll be honest.  I zoomed in on the screenshot to see if they gave his cigar back at full ammo or something.

I feel like I've been tricked.
They should change it to give him passive dodge chance and call it "Close, but no cigar"
How about... Destiny's Child?

Well when he talks he says "It's destiny" (CORRECT ME IF IM WRONG CAUSE I DONT PLAY HIM)
and it should be called It's Destiny
What about `` You got time to bleed´´ or `` Rest in pieces´´?
